recommendations.title: Fix Critical React Performance Issues
recommendations.action: Fix useEffect dependency arrays, optimize re-renders, and implement proper memoization
recommendations.impact: High impact on FID and runtime performance

recommendations.title: Fix Memory Leaks
recommendations.action: Add proper cleanup in useEffect, clear intervals/timeouts, and remove event listeners
recommendations.impact: High impact on long-term performance and stability

recommendations.title: Improve First Input Delay (FID)
recommendations.action: Reduce JavaScript execution time, implement code splitting, and optimize React components

recommendations.title: Refactor Complex Components
recommendations.action: Break down large components into smaller, focused components
recommendations.impact: Medium impact on maintainability and performance

recommendations.title: Optimize CSS
recommendations.action: Remove unused CSS, consolidate duplicate rules, and optimize selectors
recommendations.impact: Medium impact on bundle size and render performance

recommendations.title: Implement Performance Monitoring
recommendations.description: Add real-time performance monitoring and alerting
recommendations.action: Set up Core Web Vitals tracking, error monitoring, and performance budgets
recommendations.impact: Low immediate impact, high long-term value
